summary: This is an FBI FD-794 payment authorization form requesting reimbursement for trial witness expenses incurred on June 23, 2021, related to the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking case (Case ID 507 3-NY-302757).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the child sex trafficking case for which witness expenses are being reimbursed.

events.title: Trial witness expenses incurred
events.description: Expenses related to a trial witness were incurred on this date, for which reimbursement is being requested.

events.title: Payment authorization request submitted
events.description: An FBI Supervisory Special Agent drafted and approved a form to request reimbursement for trial witness expenses.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI payment authorization form (FD-794) for reimbursing trial witness expenses.
The expenses were incurred on June 23, 2021, and the request was drafted/approved on October 25, 2021.
The case is identified as 507 3-NY-302757, concerning Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking.
The form indicates ongoing legal proceedings or witness-related activities in the Epstein case as of mid-2021.
